content.text:
Let me help you construct this structure based on the target image and block dictionary.

Analysis of Target Image:
- Total Blocks: 5 blocks
- Layers: 3 layers
- Colors: Red, Yellow, and Orange
- Structure: A vertical column with side blocks

Block Selection from Dictionary:
1. Top Layer (Yellow): Block 10 and 11 (curved yellow blocks)
2. Middle Layer (Red): Block 4 (curved red block)
3. Vertical Support (Orange): Block 8 (vertical orange cylinder)
4. Side Blocks (Orange): Blocks 13 and 14 (angular orange blocks)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 8
    Step2: Move block with index 4 on top of block 8
    Step3: Move block with index 13 next to block 8
    Step4: Move block with index 14 on the opposite side of block 8
    Step5: Move block with index 10 on top of block 4
    Step6: Move block with index 11 next to block 10
}

This sequence will recreate the target structure exactly as shown in the first image.
